title: Update brand image and guideline
description: I want to add more colors and more lively character to Lumicello's brand.

title: Add analytics tracking for robots.txt and llms.txt access
description: Cannot track crawler access to .txt files with Umami analytics. Files are served as raw text. Consider Cloudflare analytics, Render.com logs, or Umami server-side API.

title: Rephrase heading and content on Careers page
description: Keep team small, not recruiting yet. Not actually 'Under Construction' - just not accepting applicants but don't want to shut doors.

description: Change 'Under Construction' to something that is more meaningful and witty.

title: [Bug]: Exploration kit descriptions truncated on mobile
description: Kit card descriptions truncated to 2 lines on mobile (320px-768px) due to CSS -webkit-line-clamp: 2. Consider increasing to 3-4 lines or removing clamp entirely.

title: [Design]: Create professional OpenGraph image for social media sharing
description: Current logo as OG image is wrong dimensions (should be 1200x630). Design task requiring brand colors, tagline, and relevant imagery. Update all 7 HTML files after creation.

title: [Content]: Change image at Spark and About
description: Images don't represent section content. Light color on light color makes images too subtle. Should clearly illustrate the message and align with brand guidelines.

title: [Feature]: Slow down the marquee section
description: Scrolling text in 'Problems Parents Face' marquee section moves too fast. Increase animation duration from 60s to 90s or 120s for readable pace.
